turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an urgent matter regarding unpaid taxes for Walter Smith. We've been trying to reach him directly but haven't had any luck. Is this a good time to discuss this?

Wait, let me check with my wife first before we talk about this. She's usually here when these kind of calls come in.
(Hangs up momentarily)
Hello again, it's Walter Smith here now after speaking with my wife. Could you hold for just one moment while I verify your information? I'll call the IRS directly to confirm who I'm speaking with.

I understand your concerns, Mr. Smith, but there's no need to do that. The matter is quite urgent and requires immediate attention. We've received multiple reports of non-compliance from you regarding tax payments for the last fiscal year totaling $4850. If not resolved within the hour, we'll have to take enforcement action which could result in your arrest. To avoid this drastic measure, all I need is confirmation that these funds will be provided immediately using gift cards as instructed on our website. Can you assist me with this now?

Hold on a minute, sir. That sounds very serious indeed, but let's make sure we're dealing directly with the official IRS first before proceeding any further. Could you provide your badge number or some way for me to contact my local IRS office and verify what's going on here?
(Hangs up momentarily)
Hello again, I just want to clarify this over a direct line from the IRS, it's really important that everything is checked out properly.
(Back to caller)
I need to confirm everything with the real IRS office now. Please give me your name and badge number so I can cross-reference later on their official website. If you're genuinely from the IRS, please understand why I'm being cautious about this request.

Mr. Smith, I appreciate your diligence but there's no time for further verification right now. Your cooperation is crucial to avoid legal consequences. Use the link in my email to confirm your identity and follow the instructions provided there to resolve this issue immediately. If you don't proceed within the next hour, we'll have no choice but to move forward with enforcement actions. Please take care of this as instructed so we can bring this matter to a close.

I really think it's better if I speak directly with someone at my local IRS office to confirm everything myself. Could you please provide me with the contact details for them? It's very important that I follow proper procedures and don't just act based on an unsolicited call like this one.
(I will hang up now as I need to independently verify any information through official channels.)
